value:
I hope you'll read books to me a lot.
I'm trying to learn how to read,
so every little bit helps!

Oh, Lloyd...Linus...and dear old
Uncle Legault...

Thanks so much for all you do!
Just be sure not to exhaust
yourself, OK?

Family is...so important. If I ever have
a chance to have my own family,
I'd love twins!

I'd love to try cooking sometime.
Sweets, if I can! Think it'd be possible
to do that here?

Oh, is it you? It must be! You're
$Nu, right?$k$pI'm Nino! And I've come to deliver a
hello from a friend of yours!

Now, leave everything to me!
I know I can do it!
Now I'll be of more help here!

No! I don't want to be useless
forever!

You know I'll do my best. The
Black Fang trained me!

I'm Nino, a member of the Black
Fang! Oh, well...I guess these days
I'm just a regular ol' mage.

I'm so happy to be here, where I
can spend time with so many
nice people. Every day is so fun.$k$pI had this once before, surrounded
by people I loved. They were
all...like family.$k$pThat life is over, but it was so
much fun while it lasted. I'm glad
now, thinking back on it.$k$pThose memories were painful for
a while, but you helped me
remember the good times.$k$pThank you! I promise to work
so very hard for you. Just you
wait and see!
はいっ！
えいっ！
きゃああっ！
I-I gotta stay strong...
Ahhhhhhh!
I won't lose! Not me!
I can do this!
I'll do my best!
I'm sorry...
Heehee
What do you need? To talk? I'm always up for that!
Aaah! Whew! Got scared for a second.
I never learned to read very well. You'll help me with that, right?
I'll work really hard for you. Cross my heart and hope to die!
You can't imagine how happy I am to be here!
The Black Fang was my family. I...wonder how the rest of them are doing.
I love baked dumplings more than anything! We should find some!
OK!
Yes?
Do my best!
